thread.title: Re: Guess how Chuck Schumer can tell the country is ‘moving in the right direction’
thread.title_full: Re: Guess how Chuck Schumer can tell the country is ‘moving in the right direction’

author: Stan
title: Re: Guess how Chuck Schumer can tell the country is ‘moving in the right direction’
text:
Here’s how Chuck Schumer can tell the ‘country is moving in the right direction’ Posted at 10:11 am on February 6, 2017 by Doug P. This is a bad tweet. 
Dude…it was the greatest Super Bowl in history. Don't be THIS guy. https://t.co/7eqQspC1ss 
— Drew McCoy (@_Drew_McCoy_) February 6, 2017 
Last night’s Super Bowl featured ads addressing things like pay equality and immigration , and Sen. Chuck Schumer saw it as a reason for Democrat optimism: Great Super Bowl ads this yr. Shows the country is moving in the right direction: pro-women, pro-environment, pro-immigrant, pro-diversity. 
— Chuck Schumer (@SenSchumer) February 6, 2017 
At this point the Democrats will cling to any life raft they feel has been thrown to them. Because nothing says "average Americans" like a multi-million dollar ad buy. https://t.co/fBmsAfdP2o
